DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate effect filgotinib combination methotrexate ( MTX ) versus MTX alone adults active rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Filgotinib Alone Combination With Methotrexate ( MTX ) Adults With Moderately Severely Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Are Naive MTX Therapy
DOC.criteria: Have diagnosis RA ( 2010 ACR/EULAR criterion ) ACR functional class IIII . Have ≥ 6 swollen joint ( swollen joint count base 66 joint ( SJC66 ) ) ≥ 6 tender joint ( tender joint count base 68 joint ( TJC68 ) ) screen Day 1 . Limited prior treatment MTX Previous treatment janus kinase ( JAK ) inhibitor Previous therapy longer 3 month conventional synthetic disease modify antirheumatic drug ( csDMARDs ) MTX hydroxychloroquine Use license investigational biologic DMARDs
